profile.name: Philippe Delteil
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | INFO-SEC
profile.summary: Highly motivated and detail-oriented software engineer with a passion for systems programming, bug bounty programs, and cybersecurity. Proficient in Rust, Python, and various tools and frameworks.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Designed and developed secure systems using Rust and Python.
Participated in legitimate bug bounty programs to identify vulnerabilities and improve system security.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed custom software solutions for clients using Python and various frameworks.
Maintained open-source projects on GitHub, including bug fixes and feature enhancements.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributed to multiple open-source projects, including code reviews and bug fixes.
Improved project documentation and user experience.

Bug Bounty Programs: Participated in legitimate bug bounty programs like trusty-bbp and scammy-bbp.
